2026-01-28.title: Log In
2026-01-28.body: Hi everyone, as aap logo ne dekh liya hoga home page, I am Kishna Tiwari, is website ka owner. Main engineering First Year ka student hu abhi aur mujhko ek VLSI engineer bnna hai. Yahan pr main apni daily life record krunga tbh ye idea mereko ek random website se aaya jiska maine domain aise hi type krdiya tha internet pr. Wo ek japanese woman ki website thi jahan wo apni puri life record kri hai 15 saal tk like WOAH. Wo ab usko pdhti hogi to usko kitni nostalgic se feeluing aati ho yaar like pure 15 saal uske bacche jab chote the jb unki shaadi hogyi lol. Jab maine dekha ye sab maine socha mujhe bhi krna hai yaar ye aur main karunga. Website nahi bn rhi thi bhai ğŸ˜­ğŸ˜­ğŸ˜­ isliye itna time lg gya isko start krne me wrna main last year september me hi start krdiya hota aur tbh aalsi to main hu hi lol. Huge thanks to TG2 for making this website for me yaar. To yes 28 january aur subah ke 4:25 am pr, I LOG IN this website!! ğŸ˜ŠğŸ˜Š. Mera kal ka din theek bhot theek gya kal mere semester one ke exams end hue phewwwwwww aur sab theek gye (maths me back na aajaye bs ğŸ˜­ğŸ™) kal last exam tha ie Mechanical engineering basics ka aur tbh wo bhi thoda tougher side pe tha. Aur ofc baarish honi thi end day pr. bheegta hua gya aur bheegta hua aaya bhot thand lg rhi aur bina thermals ke gya tha lol. Ghar aake bs soya bhai usse ek din phle raat me soya hi nahi tha ğŸ˜­ pure 4 ghante some k baad mobile me girlfriend ka msg pda tha aur uska 11 minute ka voice note (yaar kitniiii cute hai meri kuchupuchu ğŸ¥° aur phir pure din pubg khela yaar tension hati dimaag se to bs pure din wo khela. Aaj se gym jaane ki socha tha but time pr so nahi paaya aur raat me phir washing machine me kapde laga diye to unke wjh se jaagna pda aur ab ye journal likh rha. Thank god washing machine khaali mil gyi wrna hr time kisi na kisi ke kapde rhte usme aur lol Main hostel me rhta hu forgot to mention it. Well then ab I hope so main roz entry kr sku apni journal me and dear viewer thanks for reading this far, I really appreciate this. Koi image lagane ko nahi to main isko upload krne ki image laga dunga lol. STAY TUNED, THANKS.
